Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is part of the "The Chase" application. "The Chase" is an extremely complicated, text based adventure game. This class defines the items that one are able to pick up, drop or show to characters throughout the game.
    Version:
    2013.12.18
    Author:
    Viktor Holmér

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String description,
    java.lang.String itemName)
        Creates an item with a description and a name.
        Parameters:
        description - Describes the item.
        itemName - The name of the item.

    • Method Detail

      • setToRemove

        public void setToRemove()
        Sets the value of the boolean toRemove to true. If this is true when the item is used as a key to a room, it will be removed from the inventory of the player.

      • toRemove

        public java.lang.Boolean toRemove()
        Returns:
        The value of the boolean toRemove.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns:
        The description of the item.s

      • getItemName

        public java.lang.String getItemName()
        Returns:
        The name of the item.
